item.title: 关于

item.title: Evernote
item.description: 欢迎使用马克飞象 @(示例笔记本)[马克飞象|帮助|Markdown] 马克飞象是一款专为印象笔记（Evernote）打造的Markdown编辑

item.title: 【转】oh-my-zsh: git Plugin
item.description: The git Plugin The git plugin provides many aliases and a few useful functions. Enable it by adding git to the plugins array before sourcing OMZ (see [[Plugins]]). Aliases Alias Command g git ga git add gaa git add –all gapa git add –patch gau git add –update gb git branch gba git branch -a gbda git branch –merged | command grep -vE “^(*|\smaster\s$)” | command xargs -n 1 git branch -d gbl git blame -b -w gbnm git branch –no-merged gbr git branch –remote gbs git bisect gbsb git bisect bad gbsg git bisect good gbsr git bisect reset gbss git bisect start gc git commit -v gc!

item.title: Ubuntu设置静态IP
item.description: Ubuntu的网络参数保存在文件 /etc/network/interfaces中，默认设置使用dhcp，内容如下： # The primary network interface auto eth0 iface eth0 inet dhcp 设置

item.title: pm2 服务开机自启动
item.description: pm2 start index.js —name app_name pm2 save pm2 startup(按照CLI提示复制相应命令并执行) 参考： https://pm2.io/doc/en/runtime/guide/startup-hook/#installation

item.title: ionic 模拟器运行失败解决方案
item.description: 提示错误： 命令行中编译项目成功，但是无法直接运行至模拟器，提示如下错误： No target specified for emulator. Deploying to undefined simulatorDevice type "com.apple.CoreSimulator.SimDeviceType.undefined" could not be found.[ERROR] An error occurred while running cordova run ios (exit code 1). 解决方案： 在项目
